definition: to worry about personal gains and losses
to suffer (from illness)/to contract (a disease)/misfortune/trouble/danger/worry
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to suffer (from illness)/to contract (a disease)/misfortune/trouble/danger/worry
to lose/to miss/to fail

sentences.english: Facing honor, don't calculate gain or loss, but be restrained.
sentences.chinese: 面对荣耀时，不要患得患失，要以克制为良方。

sentences.english: Firmly grasp, but do not worry about the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 紧紧把握生活，但不要患得患失。

sentences.english: In the Vatican sound waves , cooling is already have got lost .
sentences.chinese: 在梵音袅袅中，冷却的是拥有的患得患失。

definition: to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
to suspect everyone/overly suspicious
worried too much
afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous/afraid of the slightest thing
indecisive/irresolute
lit. silly people get their panties in a bunch (idiom)/fig. to get upset over nothing/to make problems for oneself
to indulge in flights of fancy (idiom)/to let one's imagination run wild
to suspect/to have misgivings/suspicious/misgivings
to be on tenterhooks (idiom)/to be anxious and frightened
mistrustful/suspicious/paranoid
hesitancy/indecision/to waver
fretful/impatient
to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally
to be suspicious and jealous of
lit. to fear the wolf in front and the tiger behind (idiom)/fig. to be full of needless fears/reds under the beds
pinyin: qian2 pa4 lang2 hou4 pa4 hu3

definition: emotional/sentimental
